sentences.sContent: The Porsche 911 reminds me of the worst parts of the yuppie era.
sentences.sCn: 这辆保时捷911使我想起了雅皮士时代最糟糕的日子。

trans.tranCn: （美）雅皮士（属于中上阶层的年轻专业人士）
trans.tranOther: a young person with a professional job who seems to be interested only in earning a lot of money and buying expensive things
